meta.title: Undertake brief development to address an issue
meta.purpose: This achievement standard involves undertaking brief development to address an issue by exploring a context, determining needs and stakeholders, considering environments, and producing a final brief including a conceptual statement and specifications.

grade_descriptors.N1: Evidence does not reach the minimum threshold for Achieved-level indicators.
grade_descriptors.N2: Some Achieved-level indicators are met, but not enough to satisfy all required Achieved criteria.
grade_descriptors.A3: All Achieved-level indicators are met; no Merit-level indicator meets the Merit threshold.
grade_descriptors.A4: All Achieved indicators are met and at least one Merit indicator is met, but overall performance is below the Merit threshold.
grade_descriptors.M5: All Achieved indicators are met and the Merit threshold is reached; no Excellence-level indicator meets the Excellence threshold.
grade_descriptors.M6: All Achieved indicators are met, all Merit indicators are met, and at least one Excellence indicator is met, but overall performance is below the Excellence threshold.
grade_descriptors.E7: All Achieved and Merit indicators are met and the Excellence threshold is reached, but not all Excellence indicators are met.
grade_descriptors.E8: All Achieved, Merit, and Excellence indicators are met.

key_terms.definition: A succinct guiding document that includes a conceptual statement and specifications describing what is to be developed and why.
Individuals or groups who have a vested interest in the technological outcome and provide feedback.
Characteristics that define how the outcome looks (physical) and operates (functional).
The wider social and physical environment in which technological development occurs.

omis.description: Identifies an issue as a result of exploring the given context.
omis.detection_hint: Stating the context alone is not enough; the student must explicitly identify a specific issue arising from their exploration of the teacher-provided context. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: The issue was the lack of storage space in the room.
The garment must stand out on the runway.

omis.description: Determines a need or opportunity and identifies associated stakeholders relevant to the issue.
omis.detection_hint: Naming a need is not enough; the student must also identify real, relevant stakeholders linked to that need. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: The need for a functional unit was identified and discussed with my mother.
The outfit was needed for a 21st and a fashion show.

omis.description: Reflects ongoing consideration of the social and physical environment during brief development.
omis.detection_hint: One-off mentions of the environment are insufficient; the student must show how environmental factors (e.g., space, lighting, season) informed outcome design. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: The fashion show’s lighting influenced the choice of fabric and colour.
Space constraints in the venue were considered in the design.

omis.description: Reflects ongoing input from key stakeholders throughout the brief development.
omis.detection_hint: Simply mentioning stakeholders is not enough; their input must be shown to influence decision-making. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: My mother wanted the unit to match the décor.
The organiser suggested bold colours for visual impact.

omis.description: Describes the outcome to be developed and explains why it should be developed.
omis.detection_hint: Describing the outcome is insufficient unless accompanied by a justification that draws from findings in the context exploration. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: The unit will store tools needed daily to avoid mess.
The outfit is for both the 21st birthday and the runway.

omis.description: Explains the required physical and functional attributes of the outcome.
omis.detection_hint: Listing attributes is not enough; the student must explain why those attributes are necessary based on the context or stakeholder input. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: It must be waterproof to handle spills.
The high neckline allows for modesty at formal events.

omis.description: Produces a final brief containing a conceptual statement and measurable specifications.
omis.detection_hint: The student must clearly present both a conceptual statement (explaining what and why) and specifications (measurable requirements). Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: My final brief includes the outcome’s purpose and the measurements required.
The brief outlines both form and function.

omis.description: Prioritises social and physical environmental considerations to inform decision-making.
omis.detection_hint: Listing environmental factors is not sufficient; the student must show how these considerations influenced final decisions (e.g. material, dimensions, aesthetics). Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: Three coats of oil were chosen for durability in the workshop.
Fabric was selected to reflect light on the runway.

omis.description: Integrates ongoing feedback from both key and wider stakeholders into the brief development.
omis.detection_hint: Mentioning consultation is not enough; the student must show how broader feedback shaped or refined the brief. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: Feedback from the event organiser led to changing the colour palette.
The shelf height was adjusted after testing with peers.

omis.description: Justifies why this particular outcome was chosen to address the issue.
omis.detection_hint: Explaining the outcome is not enough; the student must justify how it specifically addresses the issue better than alternatives. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: The outfit’s dramatic design ensures it stands out among competitors.
The compact design makes it ideal for small bedrooms.

omis.description: Justifies the specifications in relation to the physical and functional attributes required for the outcome.
omis.detection_hint: Stating the specifications is not enough; the student must explain why each one is necessary in relation to appearance, performance, or environment. Highlight the exact phrase(s) that satisfy or violate this indicator.
success_examples: Velcro was chosen because it allows for quick costume changes.
Slanted sides reduce tipping on uneven flooring.
